spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 2,191 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 5.3 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Sever your bond at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 80,439 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your taunt abilities activate the module's refracting energy, protecting you from 50% of damage taken, up to 2.9 million. This may only occur once every 1 min.
Equip: Your melee attacks have a chance to inject volatile black blood into your target, inflicting 53,710 Shadow damage over 3 sec.
